abstract module¶

Outputs LaTeX/TikZ abstract tree diagrams to Manager.stream.

class abstract.AbstractNode(label, x=0.0, y=0.0)¶

Bases: object

abstract.abstract_descendant(node, depth, find_leftmost)¶

Find leftmost/rightmost descendant at given depth. Returns descendant.

abstract.abstract_diagram(tree)¶

Convert abstract syntax tree into LaTeX/TikZ diagram written to Manager.stream.

Parameters

tree – A nested list representing a syntax tree structure

Return type

None

abstract.abstract_limit(node, depth, find_leftmost)¶

Calculate leftmost/rightmost limit at given depth.

abstract.abstract_position(tree)¶

Position all nodes in a tree. Returns root node of positioned tree. tree: nested list representation [label, child1, child2, …]

abstract.abstract_translate(node, dx, dy)¶

Translate a node and all its descendants by (dx, dy).

abstract.abstract_write_commands(tree)¶

Write Tikz commands for tree rooted at node.

Parameters

node – AbstractNode

Return type

None

Return type

abstract.get_all_descendants(node)¶

Helper function to get all descendants of a node, including the node itself.
